author: mid-day online correspondent
title: Watch Alia Bhatt and Varun Dhawan in romantic song 'Humsafar' from 'Badrinath Ki Dulhaniya'
text:
Alia Bhatt and Varun Dhawan in a still from 'Humsafar' song from 'Badrinath Ki Dulhaniya'. Pics/YouTube 
A new song titled 'Humsafar' from 'Badrinath Ki Dulhaniya' starring Alia Bhatt and Varun Dhawan is out!

Alia Bhatt and Varun Dhawan in a still from 'Humsafar' song from 'Badrinath Ki Dulhaniya' 
WATCH 'HUMSAFAR' SONG: 

The trailer of 'Badrinath Ki Dulhania' and the film's songs, including a reprised version of 1990s' hit 'Tamma Tamma' have been receiving quite a positive response since its release.
Watch Alia Bhatt and Varun Dhawan groove to 'Tamma Tamma Again' 
 
Directed by Shashank Khaitan, 'Badrinath Ki Dulhaniya' is slated to release on March 10.
